it.unica.foresee
Class Foresee

java.lang.Object
  it.unica.foresee.Foresee

public class Foresee
extends java.lang.Object

Main class to run the Foresee framework.

Possible arguments are:

  • -h --help: Shows help message
  • -p --path: Path to the instruction file folder
  • -i --interactive: Interactive Mode (default)
Options:
  • -v --verbose: Enable verbose output
  • -l --legacy: Enable the legacy ART parser

Accepted extensions for the instructions file are the following:

  • .fs
  • .foresee
  • .ins
  • .instruction

mainHelper

public static int mainHelper(java.lang.String[] args)

Actual main method which runs the program.

While having this method and the #main() may seem redundant, this choice is done to make testing the methods of this class easier.

Parameters:
args - command line arguments
Returns:
